title: Better initialization in Embedding class
body_html:
I noticed that the weight initialization in the Embedding class is:

def reset_parameters(self):
    self.weight.data.normal_(0, 1)

It took me many hours to find out the reason why my net did not train. The values are too high.
I suggest to initialize with the same option as other linear layers.

A workaround to this is just to make the initialization yourself.
